scripts.setupConsole: cd ../frontend-console/ && yarn install && yarn build && cd ../integration-tests/
scripts.buildImages: wrap () { cd ../$1/ && pwd && docker buildx bake && cd ../integration-tests/ ;}; wrap
scripts.startEnvironment:prod: wrap(){ cd ../$1/ && docker-compose -f ../docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.override.yml up -d && cd ../integration-tests/ ;}; wrap
scripts.startEnvironment:host: wrap(){ cd ../$1/ && docker-compose -f ../docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.override.yml -f ../docker-compose-host.yml up -d && cd ../integration-tests/ ;}; wrap
scripts.stopEnvironment: wrap(){ target_dir=$(cat target) && cd ../$target_dir/ && pwd && docker-compose -f ../docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.override.yml down -v ; }; wrap
scripts.test:ci: wrap () { yarn saveTarget $1 && yarn startEnvironment:prod $1 && yarn mocha:prod $*  ; }; wrap
scripts.test:prod: wrap () { yarn saveTarget $1 && yarn buildImages $1 && yarn startEnvironment:prod $1 && yarn mocha:prod $* ;}; wrap
scripts.test:host: wrap () { yarn saveTarget $1 && yarn startEnvironment:host $1 && yarn mocha:host $*  ;}; wrap
scripts.test: wrap () { yarn test:prod $* && yarn test:host $* ;}; wrap
scripts.saveLogs: saveLogs () { mkdirp logs && cd ../$1/ && docker-compose -f ../docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.override.yml logs --timestamps --no-log-prefix --no-color $2 > ../integration-tests/logs/$2.log; }; saveLogs
